name: Origin of the Sword Mage: Demo
name_original: Origin of the Sword Mage: Demo
description:
This is a free demo of the project "Origin of the Sword Mage".
Use up to six swords, each with different abilities, to defend yourself and survive the enemy waves of bee, eagle and slime monsters as long as possible. Perhaps you will be able to set a new record?

Introducing the six swords:

-> Flamberger: burn your enemies
-> Ragnarök: a sword that emits thunder
-> Gladius: anchor shaped sword that can knock down your enemy
-> Test swords: normal swords that cut through your foes

Credits:
All music tracks are made by Makai Symphony. 
https://makai-symphony.com/

How to play?

Download the game below and run the .exe file.
